text:
org.apache.batik.ext.awt.image.codec.PNGImageEncoder
writes a gamma value of 0.45454 (rounded down from 1/2.2)
for sRGB, but the spec requires 0.45455 (rounded up).
I haven't found any software that minds, so this is
probably just a minor issue of strict conformance to
the spec.
creator: fpahl@web.de

text: This will be fixed in CVS shortly.
creator: deweese@apache.org
